title: They got hacked with NSO spyware. Now Israel wants Palestinian activists' funding cut
content:
1. They got hacked with NSO spyware. Now Israel wants Palestinian activists' funding cut  NPR
  2. PA alleges: NSO Group spyware used to hack foreign ministry workers’ phones  The Times of Israel
  3. Phones of Palestinian NGO workers infected with Pegasus spyware, rights groups say  CNN
  4. Private Israeli spyware found on phones of 6 Palestinian human rights activists | TheHill  The Hill
  5. PA accuses Israel of spying on its foreign ministry with NSO Group’s Pegasus  The Times of Israel
contentSnippet:
They got hacked with NSO spyware. Now Israel wants Palestinian activists' funding cut  NPR
PA alleges: NSO Group spyware used to hack foreign ministry workers’ phones  The Times of Israel
Phones of Palestinian NGO workers infected with Pegasus spyware, rights groups say  CNN
Private Israeli spyware found on phones of 6 Palestinian human rights activists | TheHill  The Hill
PA accuses Israel of spying on its foreign ministry with NSO Group’s Pegasus  The Times of Israel

localize.title: NSOのスパイウェアでハッキングされた。イスラエルはパレスチナ人活動家の資金削減を求めている
他们被NSO的间谍软件入侵了。现在以色列要削减巴勒斯坦活动家的资金
他們被NSO的間諜軟件入侵了。現在以色列要削減巴勒斯坦活動家的資金
